title: Winegrape Growing: Fall
description: Management of campus winegrape vineyards in the fall, including harvesting; fertilization; disease, insect, vertebrate and weed management; pruning; soil management; trellis repair; and cover crop planting and maintenance. 1 lecture, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: FRSC/WVIT 231; BRAE 340; SS 221; PPSC 321; and STAT 218
